1.title: Ang pagbabalik ni Guapple
1.plot: Juan D. Magbangon is at a crossroads, unable to choose between his longtime love and political science professor Marie Guiguinto and his quirky new crush the school mascot Mayumi. He feels his lack of direction may have something to do with the disappearance of the program's narrator, the guava elemental Guapple. Juan and his BFF Miong go in search of the missing Guapple. They are pulled through a portal and land in the middle of the fantastic Fruit Kingdom... where they discover Guapple is about to be crowned king of all fruits. Can Juan convince Guapple to give up ...

2.title: Si Juan, dead na dead kay?
2.plot: Juan finds himself falling in love with the new girl, Mayumi. Fascinated by her many guises - as mascot, cosplayer and girl next door - Juan tries to discover who the real Mayumi is. Little by little, he realizes there truly is much more to her than meets the eye. With Juan and Mayumi sharing secrets and becoming extra close, Marie gets bitten by the jealousy bug.

3.title: The Finale
3.plot:

1.title: Juan and the Girl Next Door
1.plot: Juan has a huge crush on his next door neighbor Marie. Juan signed up for a political science course just to become Marie's classmate. But his lazy ways turned college life into an epic fail. Juan dropped out but was too afraid to tell his OFW father Tatay George.

2.title: Sina Juan at Aling Siony, magnenegosyo
2.plot: Nanay Siony uses Juan's erstwhile tuition money to enter a networking business. Juan warns her against this, to no avail. Nanay Siony turns friends, neighbors and even her catty rival Candy into her business partners.

3.title: Juan Goes Job Hunting
3.plot: To impress the well spoken Marie with his English, Juan signs up for a call center job. Juan becomes a barista at Marie's favorite coffee shop. And the coffee manages to keep him awake... for a while. As Marie works as a legal researcher in the Senate ... Juan looks for a job in government. He finally finds kindred spirits and like minded slackers at the Bureau of Internal and External Affairs. Juan's government career is an absolute riot.

4.title: Juan Goes Bangkaroti
4.plot: The bill collectors are after Juan Tamad and his Nanay Siony who are now deeply in debt after becoming victims of a networking scam. They don't just owe the electricity, water and internet companies even the neighborhood vegetable, taho and balut vendors, the Indian moneylender and Tatang Albularyo are banging down their doors.

5.title: Si Juan maghahanap bahay
5.plot: While their next door neighbors - the Guiguintos - are booking rooms at a five star hotel in time for the Papal visit, the D. Magbangons are unceremoniously booted out of their house by the local Sheriff.

6.title: Juan Meets Guapple
6.plot: Juan Tamad finally meets Guapple, a mysterious creature living inside the guava tree. Guapple is half dwarf, half kapre and all green. He shows himself only to Juan. Nanay Siony assumes Juan has gone bonkers when he starts describing his imaginary friend. Juan's sidekick Miong drags him to the mental hospital for a checkup.

7.title: Juan Becomes a Superstar
7.plot: After spending most of his life waiting under the guava tree, Juan's big moment finally arrives. The fruits of his favorite tree turn to gold and start to fall. Juan manages to catch hundreds of guavas in his mouth... at almost the same time! With his best friend Miong documenting the proceedings on his smart phone, Juan's unbelievable guava-catching video goes viral.

8.title: Juan Goes to America
8.plot: Because of his viral guava catching video, Juan is personally invited by Ms. Ellen Da General to fly to the U.S. to guest on her hit talk show!

9.title: Si Juan at ang tampuhang magkaibigan
9.plot: Miong is head over heels in love with Anika, the pretty and perky President of the Juan D. Magbangon fans' club. Anika is fan girl crazy in love with Juan, following him everywhere he goes. And Juan no longer has time for Miong since becoming an international sensation. The situation results in a huge falling out between the best friends. Insults are hurled and the two get physical. Can their friendship be saved?

10.title: Juan and the Girl in Trouble
10.plot: Juan, on a visit to Marie's office, overhears Senator Iggy Imperial and his Chief of Staff discussing how Marie has been signing documents for their fake foundations all these past months. Juan tries to warn Marie ... to no avail.

11.title: Si Juan at ang senate scandal

12.title: Si Juan at Ang Great Escape
12.plot:

13.title: Juan Saves the Day!
13.plot: Determined to save his lady love Marie, Juan enters a trap set up by the Senator's henchmen. He is an easy target but finds a unique way to fight back. He unleashes his guava catching power, raining fruits upon the bad guys with unbelievable accuracy. Juan then heads to the Senate ... where he successfully stands as senate witness against Senator Imperial's corrupt schemes. Hailed as the people's defender, only Marie's mother Candy Guiguinto remains firmly against our hero Juan.

1.title: Juan's First Date
1.plot:

2.title: Juan Meets Mini Juan
2.plot: Juan meets his biggest fan ... Bernardino Carpio or Nards for short ... a little boy who copies his every move or his lack of movements, all the way to refusing to go to school because his idol Juan is a dropout. The mysterious Nards decides to live go and live with Juan and Juan is forced to learn how to be a responsible big brother. Nards and Juan discover that something huge is cooking next door. Marie's Mommy Candy has organized a nationwide search for a son in law - inviting only the most eligible bachelors in the country. Her top three requirements: they should ...

3.title: Juan Goes Back to School
3.plot: Laziness has become a nationwide epidemic ... with a record number of students dropping out in order to copy their idol Juan D. Magbangon. Why study when one can become rich and famous by lying under a guava tree, they ask? When his own little ward Nards refuses to go back to grade 4, Juan is forced to make a deal. Juan will go back to school ... as long as Nards does the same!

4.title: Si Juan, may tatlong karibal!
4.plot: Juan is forced to get up and compete with a trio of buff, intelligent and good-looking rivals for Marie's attention: A cute new student shows up in Juan's political science class: American born TomDen Rodriguez; a ripped new instructor starts work at Marie's gym: Mark Rehas; and finally a hunky environmental activist suddenly shows up on their street by the name of Rocco Nachino. Turns out, they are the top three finalists in Mommy Candy's nationwide search for a new son-in-law. Their mission: to steal Marie's heart away from Juan Tamad.

5.title: Juan's Merry Christmas
5.plot: Juan introduces his little sidekick Nards to joyful Christmas traditions - singing Christmas carols, going gift shopping and eating puto bumbong. But before Christmas day, things slowly go sour for them and the rest of the characters in Juan Tamad. Juan is thrilled when Marie agrees to join him for simbang gabi. But she gets embarrassed when he starts to snore in the middle of the dawn mass. Shopaholic Nanay Siony can't wait to start Christmas shopping but much to her frustration, Tatay George keeps close watch that she buys only for others and not for herself. Nards ...

11.title: Juan's panindak kay Panindak
11.plot: With incriminating photos of Juan and Teacher Marie in his possession, wily Professor Panindak mounts a signature campaign to get the two, kicked out of school. But Juan is hiding tricks up his own sleeve. He records Professor Panindak's physical abuse of his students - using a whip in class for discipline. The video becomes viral, national media comes knocking at the gates of Masipag University and soon enough the entire country is discussing the issue of the crazy Professor. Meanwhile, school mascot Mayumi gets up close and personal with her crush Juan and a new ...

12.title: Astig si Tatay George!
12.plot: Juan Tamad and his father Tatay George wake up from the exact same dream ... and in it, they are beaten to a pulp by a gang of goons. Tatay George concludes this is more than a dream, it's a bad omen for them both. He decides it's time to train his lazy son in the art of self defense. Off to the training camp go father and son. But what was meant to be a bonding activity turns into a mass excursion when the entire family and the neighbors come along for the ride. Meanwhile, Juan's mysterious Lolo Apo shows up to give him additional tips on using his telekinetic powers...

13.title: Juan Gets Married?
13.plot: Juan D. Magbangon gets married this Valentine's Day. But to the wrong bride!
